channel.title: Astro Modern Personal Website Template
channel.description: Astro Modern Personal Website template with Project Section, CV Section, Paginated Blog, RSS Feed, SEO Friendly, Visual themes and Responsive Desing.

item.title: Evolution of my previous Websites
item.description: A brief timeline of the increasing complexity of my various websites.

item.title: Gameboy Emulation Project
item.description: I have been building a Gameboy emulator in my spare time. Of course, I have ran into numerous difficulties and complications, leading to a wortwhile learning experience in computer architecture and systems programming.

item.title: Creating Compilers
item.description: Recently I have bought various infamous textbooks on compilers (ie. the Dragon book) as I explore the unending rabbithole of compiler theory.
